threshold.LABEL: Maximum Age of Reports
threshold.PLACEHOLDER: During import, reports older than this many days will be ignored.

enabled.LABEL: Send abuse emails
enabled.PLACEHOLDER: When this is enabled, SynergyCP will send an email to clients every time an abuse report is assigned to one of their servers (including through auto-detection via IP). The email that is sent can be edited from System > Emails > abuse_report.tpl.

auto_suspension.LABEL: Auto Suspension
auto_suspension.PLACEHOLDER: If a report is not responded to by the client within this many days, the server will be suspended (unless it is a VIP client). Leave empty to disable auto suspension.
